tool_description: The ONLY public API for making soccer odds. Calculate 4000+ soccer odds instantly.
name: Sharp Odds Maker API
title: Sharp Odds Maker API

api_list.name: Calculate Combo Odds - Uses 2 Calls
api_list.description:
Calculate the basic and combo odds.

Combo odds - odds in which you have to satisfy two conditions of Standard Odds in order to win

required_parameters.name: profit
required_parameters.description: A decimal number that represents the percent of profit you want to have on all of your odds.

required_parameters.name: matchWinnerOddOnFavorite
required_parameters.description:
The match winner odd for the team that is the favorite.
For example, if the home team is the favorite then you would take the Match Winner 1 odd.
If the away team is the favorite then you would take the Match Winner 2 odd.

required_parameters.name: favouriteTypeOnMatch
required_parameters.description:
This parameter can only have two values:

1 - home team is favorite
2 - away team is favorite

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sharp-odds-maker-api.p.rapidapi.com/calculate/1/1.8/1.8/1.8/7.5/2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sharp-odds-maker-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sharp-odds-maker-api.p.rapidapi.com/calculate/{favouritetypeonmatch}/{matchwinneroddonfavorite}/{drawodd}/{totalgoalsover25odd}/{profit}/2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sharp-odds-maker-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Calculate Combo Odds with Or - Uses 3 Calls
api_list.description:
Calculate the Basic, Combo and Combo Odds with Or.

Combo Odds with Or - odds in which you have to satisfy only one of two conditions of Standard Odds to win

required_parameters.name: favouriteTypeOnMatch
required_parameters.description:
This parameter can only have two values:

1 - home team is favorite
2 - away team is favorite

required_parameters.name: profit
required_parameters.description: A decimal number that represents the percent of profit you want to have on all of your odds.

required_parameters.name: matchWinnerOddOnFavorite
required_parameters.description:
The match winner odd for the team that is the favorite.
For example, if the home team is the favorite then you would take the Match Winner 1 odd.
If the away team is the favorite then you would take the Match Winner 2 odd.
